name: Zombies Vs Humans - The Space Battle For Earth
name_original: Zombies Vs Humans - The Space Battle For Earth
description:
Take control of a Zombie instead of a Human!

In a classic twist on Zombie games, Zombies Vs Humans puts YOU in charge of the Zombies!

Shoot your way through flying shopping baskets and human shoppers intent on stopping you from your mission!

Collect portions of meat to gain higher scores and unlock other Zombie characters each featuring their own special weapon!

Featuring;

~ 4 Different Zombie Lead Characters!

~ Gorgeous Graphics!

~ Universal App - iPhone & iPad Compatibility!

~ Addictive Gameplay!
